features.name: getInstructorAnalytics
features.description: Calculates global metrics for an instructor including total students, revenue (from succeeded payments), and average ratings.

features.name: getCourseStudents
features.description: Retrieves real-time progress and profile data for all students enrolled in a specific course.

features.name: getInstructorCourses
features.description: Lists all courses created by a specific instructor.

features.name: getCourseEarnings
features.description: Fetches detailed earning records for an instructor's courses.

features.name: getStudentEnrollments
features.description: Fetches the 10 most recent student enrollments for an instructor's courses.
